title: Custom slash commands via // prefix
description: // activates skill menu from SkillRegistry. / shows built-in commands, // shows custom skills, erasing back transitions between them. Needs: dynamic candidates in CommandCompleter, skill dispatch on Enter, mode transition in update_command_completer_query.

logs.msg: Roadmap alignment 2026-02-12: moved to backlog while dogfood readiness gates (Sprint 16/17 + runtime stack decisions) are in flight.
